description: Astronomers have discovered 3I/ATLAS, the third known interstellar comet to pass through our solar system. Detected by the ATLAS telescope in Chile, it’s racing inward at 150,000 mph and will swing closest to the Sun in October. Estimated to be 10–20 kilometers across, it is likely the largest interstellar object observed so far. Signs of cometary activity suggest it’s an icy relic from another star system. Early detection has given astronomers time to study its composition before it’s altered by solar heating—offering rare insight into planet formation beyond our own system.
title: Astronomers Discover 3I/ATLAS, Largest Interstellar Comet Yet Detected

description: NASA’s New Horizons spacecraft accomplished a world-first by performing a deep-space stellar navigation test using stellar parallax. On April 23, 2020, while 438 million miles from Earth, it imaged nearby stars Proxima Centauri and Wolf 359. From the spacecraft’s distant viewpoint, the stars appeared slightly shifted compared to Earth-based observations, showcasing a clear demonstration of stellar parallax. By comparing these images with Earth data and a 3D star chart, scientists accurately determined New Horizons’ position within 4.1 million miles. This groundbreaking achievement proves that a spacecraft can navigate autonomously by observing stars using onboard cameras. The technique reduces reliance on Earth-based tracking systems and offers a viable navigation method for future missions to the outer solar system and beyond. NASA sees this as a vital step toward interstellar travel and self-guided deep-space exploration.
title: NASA's New Horizons Proves Deep-Space Navigation via Stellar Parallax

description: Researchers at MIT and the University of Wisconsin have developed AI-designed underwater gliders inspired by marine animals. The new shapes, generated using machine learning, move more efficiently underwater than traditional torpedo designs. This innovation could greatly improve climate and ocean monitoring by enabling better performance, energy savings, and adaptive navigation in underwater environments.
title: AI Designs Ocean Gliders Inspired by Sea Creatures to Boost Underwater Research Efficiency

description: Z5’s Kaalidhar Laapata is an emotional Hindi-language road movie about rediscovery, dignity, and friendship. With Abhishek Bachchan in one of his most moving roles, the film explores what it means to live and be remembered. As a remake of Karuppu Durai, the story gracefully transitions cultures while maintaining the heart of its message.
title: Kaalidhar Laapata Now Available on Zee5: What You Need to Know About Abhishek Bachchan's Starrer Movie

description: Varghese is a Tovino Thomas starrer political drama that follows a police officer named Varghese, whose transfer to a remote village exposes the political tensions and faults in the system. His position will be put to the test. Will he succeed? Streaming soon on Sony LIV.
title: Narivetta OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Tovino Thomas Starrer Political Drama Online?

description: Sri Sri Sri RajaVaru is a Narne Nithiin starrer whose plot revolves around Raja, a chain smoker. As his addiction towards smoking increases, his relationships and personal life start falling apart. Will he be able to stop himself, or will this smoke impact his life? Streaming now.
title: Sri Sri Sri RajaVaru Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know
